title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2818.3 - Reapplication evaluation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2818.3 - Reapplication evaluation

State Regulations
(a) Subsequent contract awards are based on a review of the items in section
2818.1
of this Part with weighted
scoring as follows: (1)
fulfillment of
contract activities; (2)
organizational and fiscal management; and
(3)
proposed program; budget and community
support. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2818.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
